page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT - HEDINGHAM
page.content: This is mainly a farming area, but there is a large factory on the A604 producing kitchen units, doors and window frames. It is the biggest employer in the area. There is also a Water Works on the A604. There is an Engineering works producing reconditioned lorry engines which are exported all over the world. In the old school buildings is a specialist silk-weaving mill producing many types of fabric especially for furnishings and royal contracts. Tourism in the area has also created a number of jobs. Many people, however, travel out of the area to find employment.
